Ideation to Business Validation

Consult Now

our Services

Start-up Formation and Compliance

  • Business Formation Services- Private Limited Company, LLP and Partnership
  • Start-up India Registration
  • Trademark,Copyright,Design and Patent Registration
  • Income tax, GST and ROC Compliances
  • Auditing and Assurance

Startup Growth Services

  • Business Modelling and Planning
  • Feasibility Study Reports
  • MIS reporting
  • Investor Pitch Deck
  • Business Valuation Reports

Start-up Consulting Services

  • Start-ups Grants and schemes consultation
  • Seed Funding assistance- KSIDC and KFC
  • Fund raising Planning
  • Start-up Business Loan support Services

Startup Restructuring Services

  • Corporate Legal Drafting and Vetting- Investor Agreements,MOU,Term sheets , Information Memorandum
  • Due Diligence Reports
  • Mergers, takeovers and acquisitions
  • Further Issues and Private Equity- CCD,ECPS and Equity Shares
  • Foreign Direct Investments and External commercial Borrowings- Convertible notes and NCD

ABOUT US

  • GHC Growth Lab has been set up with the agenda of making a difference in the Startup Ecosystem bringing the ease and excellence in Converting Startup Ideas to Valid Business Model.
  • We are a group of young and passionate Business Management professionals striving to make a positive impact on the Startup Ecosystem and help to achieve the greatest ambitions of every Startup.
  • What makes us different is the “A unique Startup for Startup Consultancy” Which provides tailormade and customized Startup advisory and Mentoring services delivered by experienced and talented professionals with quality, promptness and professionalism.

OUR KEY AREA OF FOCUS

Formation - is about inspiring and providing access to key knowledge, to help build the right mindset, understanding and abilities for the journey ahead, typical issues to avoid or solve, what steps to take in what order and about available support along the way.

Validation - is where the support focus shift to initial product development, strengthening core team via mentoring or new team members, supporting team and product validation and customer development. along the way.

Growth - is to focus is mostly about additional resourcing, growth KPI's, creating processes for scaling various business operations, improving financials and help expand business internationally

Vision

To be an Integral Part of Global Start-up Ecosystem and scale up strategist for Innovative Ideas

Mission

Innovate and Implement Business Consulting in Technology Driven Platform

Your Vision 
We Create

  • Much like a new-born, a startup needs nourishment right from its inception. It all starts with an idea-a thought that has the potential to grow into something productive.
  • GHC Growth lab  helps innovate, solve problems together, bring together cross-functional expertise and knowledge to build your own Startup.
  • We provide an opportunity to give your ideas a chance and help you kickstart your entrepreneurial efforts.
